meanings.definition: To surpass in cunning or deceit.
meanings.sent1: She always outbitches her opponents in the game of chess.
meanings.sent2: He outbitches his classmates by tricking them into doing his homework.
meanings.sent3: The clever fox outbitches the sly rabbit in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to outbitches others makes her a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent5: The detective outbitches the criminal by solving the case in record time.

meanings.definition: To outdo in a competitive or confrontational manner.
meanings.sent1: The athlete outbitches his rivals in the race.
meanings.sent2: She outbitches her colleagues by completing the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The chef outbitches the other contestants in the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: His determination to outbitches everyone else drives him to succeed.
meanings.sent5: The team captain outbitches the opposing team with a strategic play.
